page.title: Get in Touch
page.subtitle: Have questions? We're here to help. Reach out to us through email or WhatsApp

form.title: Send us an Enquiry
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you shortly

supportChannels.title: Email Support
supportChannels.description: Send us your query and we'll respond within 24 hours

supportChannels.title: WhatsApp Chat
supportChannels.description: Chat directly with us on WhatsApp for instant support

supportChannels.title: Phone Support
supportChannels.description: Call us during business hours for immediate assistance

supportChannels.title: Visit Our Office
supportChannels.description: Meet us in person at our office in New Delhi

faq.question: How long does it take to get a response?
faq.answer: We typically respond to all enquiries within 24 hours. For urgent matters, please use WhatsApp or call us directly.

faq.question: What information should I provide in my enquiry?
faq.answer: Please provide your full name, email, phone number, the service you're interested in, and a brief description of your requirements. This helps us understand your needs better.

faq.question: Do you offer consultation calls?
faq.answer: Yes! Once you submit your enquiry, we'll schedule a consultation call at a convenient time to discuss your specific needs and provide tailored solutions.

faq.question: What's the best way to contact you for urgent matters?
faq.answer: For urgent matters, we recommend using WhatsApp or calling us directly. Our team is available during business hours.
